title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8500.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8500.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Director shall
mean the Director of the Office of Business Permits. (b) Permit shall mean the whole or part of
any State agency permit, license, certificate, approval, registration, charter, or similar form of permission required by law or by State agency rules and
regulations having the force and effect of law. (c) State agency shall mean any department, board, bureau, commission, division, office, council or agency of the State, or
a public benefit corporation or public authority at least one of whose members
is appointed by the Governor. (d) Office shall mean the Office of Business Permits. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8500.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
